Help:Node.title: Command Usage: !killnote
Help:Node.Log:Description:
COMMAND USAGE: !killnote [user]
EXAMPLE: !killnote joeblow
Removes the most recent note from a user. You may have to use the !finger command to discover the user name associated with a character. These notes are all added with !addnote and viewable with !notes.
SEE ALSO: !addnote, !finger, !notes
